JSON_SETTINGS.query:
| paramdefaults
	simulation="n/a"
	database_id=-1
	tablename='gatlytron'
	chart_settings={type: "area"}
| source postgres 
	environment=param(database_id) 
	query= `
		SELECT 
			  time
			, simulation
			, user_group
			, users_active
			, users_waiting
			, users_done 
		FROM ` +param(tablename, 'gatlytron') + `
		WHERE time <= `+ (latest() / 1000) +`
		  AND time >= `+ (earliest() / 1000) +`
		  AND simulation LIKE '%`+ param("simulation", "none") +`%'
		  AND user_group IS NOT NULL
	`
| sort time
| set time = time * 1000
| crates
	name=timegroup
	by=time
	type=time 
	step=param('interval', interval()) 
	timeunit=param('interval_unit', intervalunit())
| stats by=[timegroup, user_group] users_active=AVG(users_active)
| chart 
	by=["user_group"] 
	type="area" 
	x=timegroup
	y="users_active" 
	stacked=param("stacked", false)
	showaxes=true
	pointradius=2
	# following overrides the settings above
	settings = tojson(param("chart_settings", {}))

| paramdefaults
	simulation="n/a"
	database_id=-1
	tablename='gatlytron'
	chart_settings={type: "area"}
| source postgres 
	environment=param(database_id) 
	query= `
		SELECT 
			  time
			, simulation
			, user_group
			, users_active
			, users_waiting
			, users_done 
		FROM ` +param(tablename, 'gatlytron') + `
		WHERE time <= `+ (latest() / 1000) +`
		  AND time >= `+ (earliest() / 1000) +`
		  AND simulation LIKE '%`+ param("simulation", "none") +`%'
		  AND user_group IS NOT NULL
	`
| sort time
| set time = time * 1000
| crates
	name=timegroup
	by=time
	type=time 
	step=param('interval', interval()) 
	timeunit=param('interval_unit', intervalunit())
| stats by=[timegroup, user_group] users_waiting=AVG(users_waiting)
| chart 
	by=["user_group"] 
	type="steppedarea" 
	x=timegroup
	y="users_waiting" 
	stacked=false
	showaxes=false
	showlegend=false

| paramdefaults
	simulation="n/a"
	database_id=-1
	tablename='gatlytron'
	chart_settings={type: "area"}
| source postgres 
	environment=param(database_id) 
	query= `
		SELECT 
			  time
			, simulation
			, user_group
			, users_active
			, users_waiting
			, users_done 
		FROM ` +param(tablename, 'gatlytron') + `
		WHERE time <= `+ (latest() / 1000) +`
		  AND time >= `+ (earliest() / 1000) +`
		  AND simulation LIKE '%`+ param("simulation", "none") +`%'
		  AND user_group IS NOT NULL
	`
| sort time
| set time = time * 1000
| crates
	name=timegroup
	by=time
	type=time 
	step=param('interval', interval()) 
	timeunit=param('interval_unit', intervalunit())
| stats by=[timegroup, user_group] users_done=AVG(users_done)
| chart 
	by=["user_group"] 
	type="steppedarea" 
	x=timegroup
	y="users_done" 
	stacked=false
	showaxes=false
	showlegend=false

| paramdefaults
	simulation="n/a"
	database_id=-1
	tablename='gatlytron'
	chart_settings={type: "area"}
| global
	sparktype="sparkarea"
	sparkheight="75px"
	sparkwidth="15vw"
| source postgres 
	environment=param(database_id) 
	query= `
		SELECT 
			  time
			, simulation
			, request
			, ok_count
			, ko_count
			, ok_min
			, ok_max
			, ok_mean
			, ok_stdev
			, ok_p50
			, ok_p75
			, ok_p95
			, ok_p99
		FROM ` +param(tablename, 'gatlytron') + `
		WHERE time <= `+ (latest() / 1000) +`
		  AND time >= `+ (earliest() / 1000) +`
		  AND simulation LIKE '%`+ param("simulation", "none") +`%'
		  AND ok_count IS NOT NULL
	`

| set time = time * 1000
| crates
	name=timegroup
	by=time
	type=time 
	step=param('interval', interval()) 
	timeunit=param('interval_unit', intervalunit())
| stats #reduce data points to timegroup
	by=[timegroup, request] 
	"ok_count"	=sum("ok_count")
	"ko_count"	=sum("ko_count")
	"min"	=min("ok_min")
	"mean"	=avg("ok_mean")
	"max"	=max("ok_max")
	"stdev"	=avg("ok_stdev")
	"p50"	=perc("ok_p50", 50)
	"p75"	=perc("ok_p75", 75)
	"p95"	=perc("ok_p95", 95)
	"p99"	=perc("ok_p99", 99)
| stats # now make statistics by request and create groups for charts
	by=[request] 
	"ok_count"	=sum("ok_count")
	"ko_count"	=sum("ko_count")
	"min"	=min("min")
	"mean"	=avg("mean")
	"max"	=max("max")
	"stdev"	=avg("stdev")
	"p50"	=perc("p50", 50)
	"p75"	=perc("p75", 75)
	"p95"	=perc("p95", 95)
	"p99"	=perc("p99", 99)
	"counts" = records()
	"metrics" = records()
| formatfield
	request=[
			  ['css', "max-width", "20vw"]
			 ,['css', "text-wrap", "wrap"]
			 ,['css', "word-wrap", "break-word"]
		]
			
	fields(request, "counts", "metrics")=['align', "right"]
	
	[mean, stdev]=['decimals', 1]
	
| formatchart 
	fields=["counts"] 	
	y=["ok_count", "ko_count"]	
	x=timegroup 
	type=globals("sparktype") 
	height=globals("sparkheight") 
	width=globals("sparkwidth") 
	pointradius=0 
| formatchart 
	fields=["metrics"] 
	by=[]
	y=["min", "mean", "p95", "max"]	
	x=timegroup 
	type=globals("sparktype") 
	height=globals("sparkheight") 
	width=globals("sparkwidth") 
	pointradius=0 

| display 
	as=table 
	sizes = [10, 25, 50, 100]
	defaultsize=10

parameters.LABEL: Query Select
parameters.NAME: simulation
parameters.VALUE:
| source postgres 
	environment={"id":5,"name":"Postgres Localhost"} 
	query= `
		SELECT DISTINCT simulation FROM gatlytron
		WHERE time <= `+(latest() / 1000)+`
		  AND time >= `+(earliest() / 1000)+`
	`
